owner of the club went on air to say that the contract was not valid claiming that hes signature had being forge.After days of declarations of does who said the club was sold and does who claim the club had not being sold ,on novemebr 21 the auxiliary notary's office ,Esperanza MartÃ­nez Orozco, confirm that notary number 12 (were elegantly the contract had being done ) from that city did not participate nor acknowledge the document were the club had being sold , claiming that indeed the signatures had being forge.After this declaration Aurelio Almeida was not heard from and the club prepare for the 2008 clausura .
